content: looking for a customizable amigurumi base this chibi amigurumi doll base is the perfect starting point for all your character creations with a classic chibi style big head tiny body it s designed to be simple versatile and beginner-friendly whether you re turning it into a pop culture icon a loved one or your own original character this no-fuss base gives you a solid foundation to build from this is a no-sew crochet pattern arms and legs are created using popcorn stitches * this pattern is written using us crochet terms * this no-sew amigurumi doll is worked from the bottom up * use the yarn under single_crochet 1 technique to achieve tighter more aligned stitches * learn how to change colors 2 in crochet to create seamless color transitions * crochet in continuous spiral rounds do not join at the end of each round unless otherwise stated * use a running stitch marker 3 to keep your place when crocheting in rounds * use the ultimate finish 4 to neatly close up your amigurumi pieces * optional use invisible decreases 5 to enhance the appearance of your amigurumi * optional use the half-color change technique 6 for clean color transitions between rounds 1 https //www onceuponacheerio com/2022/05/how-to-yarn-under-single-crochet html 2 https //www onceuponacheerio com/2023/04/how-to-change-color-in-crochet html 3 https //www onceuponacheerio com/2023/04/how-to-use-running-stitch-marker html 4 https //www onceuponacheerio com/2023/04/close-amigurumi-ultimate-finish html 5 https //www onceuponacheerio com/2023/04/how-to-single-crochet-decrease html 6 https //www onceuponacheerio com/2019/07/half-colour-changes-for-perfect-stripes html
